==Pre-release==
{{More images}}{{Lost version|nolauncher=1}}
'''0.9833 pre-release''' is the first and final pre-release for [[MinecraftEdu mod 0.9833]], released on October 19, 2012. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.2.5]].{{Infobox version
| title = mod 0.9833
| image = MinecraftEdu mod 0.9833.png
| edition = MinecraftEdu
| date = October 19, 2012
}}
=== Additions ===
New MinecraftEdu pre-release was just released yesterday. Everyone who wants to help us test the new version should try it out as official new release is planned to be released next week (if no game-breaking bugs occur). You can grab the latest pre-release version from our member sites.
'''New cool stuff'''

As usual, changelog for this pre-release can be found here! Some cool new additions:
*Added PVP button in general menu!
*New COOL tooltips for all setting buttons in client!
*All general & assignment information is now also saved with map!
All problems can be reported directly at support(at)teachergaming.com or directly in our Twitter accounts. Have fun! Posted by [https://twitter.com/Kulttuuri Kulttuuri] on [https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/33885451754/minecraftedu-09833-final-pre-release-new Tumblr] published on October 19, 2012..
